Closure HTMLAPI documentation

Package: hax

Function characters

Lambda List

characters (handler data)

Arguments

  • handler -- a HAX/SAX handler (see abstract-handler for details)
  • data -- rod/string

Return Value

unspecified

Details

Signals character data.

This event represents character data in a document.
